subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Afeter a long discussion...
author: Lisby
full_text:
Frank, you did what you needed to do--you spoke to him and you told  
him what you believe to be true. Now just let it go. I know you're  
mad, but when you calm some, and breathe some, I think you'll feel  
better for having confronted him.

I think our discussions--some heated--on this list over the last few  
weeks have purged us of the need to argue about he said/he said  
issues concerning the boxes. We know they work. Let's just move on in  
positive direction.

Ann

On Dec 12, 2007, at 3:23 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>  After a long discussion, and at times a yelling match with Chris  
> Moon on the phone...I have like zero memory for verbal stuff,  
> basically I think it came down to he said-she said type deal. I  
> could agree with some of what Mr Moon said, but the bottom line is-- 
> I don't care! I have had enough of these endless pissing contests,  
> one person telling me one thing, someone else telling me something  
> else. I'm not wise enough to tell who is telling the truth. I'm  
> done, I'm not discussing this stuff anymore, I'm not making boxes  
> anymore. I have absolutely no interest in the so called paranormal.  
> I don't sell this shit, I don't make any money, all it does eat all  
> my time and piss me off. I'll finish this last box I'm working on,  
> and that's it. No more e-mails, no more discussion--I have had it!
>
>  Mr Moon said he would be glad to come on the group and answer  
> question--so there ya go, now is your chance. I'm not going to be  
> the go between, nor will I participate.
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
> Don't get caught with egg on your face. Play Chicktionary! Check it  
> out!
>
>
